name: Chuck Studios
overview:
Chuck Studios is a one-of-a-kind social game publisher. A partnership between BBH, a world famous advertising agency, and Perfetti Van Melle, owners of the iconic Chupa Chups brand.

Chuck Studios’ aim is to produce very high quality games using business models that provide mutual benefit for all interested parties.

The business works in partnership with the best game studios to publish successful titles for worldwide release. We offer Chupa Chups intellectual property, a huge online fanbase, and access to funding and global marketing support, magnified by BBH’s creative firepower and operational expertise. We are always on the lookout for new, ground breaking game concepts and ideas, as well as the talent needed to help execute them.

external_links.title: Ad Agency BBH Moves Into Social Gaming, Seeks Developers Who Like Lollipops
